item.title: Check out the new Whizbang T-Post Trellis Spans on YouTube!
item.description:
Dateline: 27 August 2016 AD I’ve just published another instructional video on YouTube. This one features the Y-shaped holders I designed a few years ago for building garden trellises. I also provide a glimpse of these trellises in my garden. T-post trellises, fitted with concrete reinforcing wire panels, are perfect for supporting indeterminate tomatoes, peas, pole beans, cucumbers, and other climbing plants. Beyond supporting plants, these trellises can act as wind barriers or privacy screens...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/check-out-the-new-whizbang-t-post-trellis-spans-on-youtube/
